original_text: And he shall offer the second for a burnt offering, according to the manner: and the priest shall make an atonement for him for his sin which he hath sinned, and it shall be forgiven him.
korean_text: 그 다음 것은 규례대로 번제를 드릴지니 제사장이 그의 잘못을 위하여 속죄한즉 그가 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And he shall offer the second
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두 번째 것을 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall make an atonement for him
for his sin which he hath sinned
and it shall be forgiven him
